definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Ore distributed shape was deduced by the apparent resistivity section.

sentences.english: Finally, the distribution and evolution of reservoir are analyzed within isochronous stratigraphic frameworks.
sentences.chinese: 最後在等時地層格架內分析了儲層的時空展布。

sentences.english: Obviously the distribution of the reservoir rocks are controlled by sedimentary microfacies.
sentences.chinese: 另外，儲集岩石類型的展布明顯地受沉積微相的控制。

sentences.english: The fluctuation of the boundary and the distribution of the deep big fault are also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 並對界面起伏及深大斷裂的展布進行了討論。

sentences.english: Preferred planes have distinct control effect on hazard occurrence and development in mining area.
sentences.chinese: 優勢面對礦區災害事故發生展布具明顯的控制作用。

sentences.english: The detachment fault occurs along the margin of the core complex as a south-facing arc-shaped line.
sentences.chinese: 剝離斷層沿變質核雜巖邊緣呈向南凸出的弧形展布。

sentences.english: The Mesozoic volcanic belt in the Changbai Mountains is parallel to the ocean continent boundary to its east.
sentences.chinese: 長白山脈中生代火山岩帶與東側之洋陸邊界平行展布。

sentences.english: Above all, it is the key factor to study fault characteristics which could make us know DB1 gas field better.
sentences.chinese: 研究斷裂的展布規律是明確氣藏特徵與規模的關鍵。

sentences.english: Pattern wheels rotate from both sides for best fabric development.
sentences.chinese: 圓盤向外兩側旋轉，展布效果佳。

sentences.english: Nearly WEtrending deep fault controlled the spatial extension of gold deposit .
